item.title: Saudi oil giant Aramco posts 5% dip in first-quarter profit on weaker crude prices
item.description: Saudi Aramco's first-quarter net profit fell 5% year-on-year amid lower oil prices and production.

item.title: Lyft closes 28% higher after issuing buyback and posting bookings growth
item.description: Lyft shares popped 28% after the ride-sharing company upped its share buyback plan and posted better-than-expected gross bookings.

item.title: Texas Roadhouse's momentum in April blunts inflation risk nipping at its heels
item.description: Early signs of a stronger second quarter were giving investors hope.

item.title: Coinbase shares fall after first-quarter revenue misses Wall Street estimates
item.description: Earlier Thursday, Coinbase announced plans to buy Dubai-based Deribit, in an attempt to broaden its international business.

item.title: Krispy Kreme stock plunges after doughnut chain pauses McDonald's rollout, pulls outlook
item.description: Krispy Kreme is pausing its nationwide rollout with McDonald's to focus on profitability.
